ml.alternet.parser.ast

Interface Mapper<Match,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    Match - Rule or Token value that matched.
    V - The type of the target value.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RuleMapper<Node>, TokenMapper<Node>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Mapper<Match,V>
    Maps a rule or token value to a custom user value.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Mapper.Builder<K extends Grammar.Rule,M extends Mapper<?,V>,V>
      A mapper builder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <K extends Grammar.Rule,M extends Mapper<?,V>,V>
      Mapper.Builder<K,M,V>      		 $()
      Convenient method for building a set of mappers.
      V transform(ValueStack<ValueMapper.Value<V>> stack, Match matcher, Deque<ValueMapper.Value<V>> data)
      Transform a rule to a node in the context of what was previously parsed in the stack, and what follows in the current rule.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        V transform(ValueStack<ValueMapper.Value<V>> stack,
            Match matcher,
            Deque<ValueMapper.Value<V>> data)
        Transform a rule to a node in the context of what was previously parsed in the stack, and what follows in the current rule.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack contains source tokens encountered so far but not yet processed. The stack is a work area that may be useful for the transformation of the token.
        matcher - The actual rule/token value to transform is supplied by the parser.
        data - The elements available in the current context of this transformation.
        Returns:
        A custom user value, or null to discard the rule, which means that all its arguments will be merged with the arguments of the nested rule.

      • $

        static <K extends Grammar.Rule,M extends Mapper<?,V>,V> Mapper.Builder<K,M,V> $()
        Convenient method for building a set of mappers.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type of the key : Rule, or Token.
        M - A subclass of Mapper.
        V - The type of the target value.
        Returns:
        A mapper builder.
